text:
Role: Integrity Business Connections (2009–2011)

Jof Davies upgraded the internal CRM and reporting systems for a telemarketing organisation. He replaced Excel-based reporting with an Access-driven system capable of automated imports, cleansing, deduplication, and structured reporting.

Responsibilities included data processing, building internal dashboards, and improving workflow reliability for call activity tracking. This role solidified Jof’s data modelling, VBA programming, and systems integration strengths.
